activities: Client (customer) information, contact details of individuals working for data protection and health authority agencies in the EEA and Switzerland, human resources data pertaining to employees/consultants of the firm who reside in the EEA or Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client data, customer data, human resource data (including manually processed data)
recoursemech: We respectfully submit to the jurisdiction of the relevant EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs) or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) in the event of any unresolved complaints.
